title: Guthix balance (unf)

properties.value: A Guthix balance (unf) is an unfinished Guthix balance. To make Guthix balance, players must have started In Aid of the Myreque and have at least level 22 Herblore.

SMW Subobject for (1)High Alchemy value: 66Examine: An unfinished potion.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Guthix balance (unf)Uses infobox: ItemImage: File:Guthix balance (unf) (1).pngWeight: 0.035Value: 110Version anchor: 1 doseRelease date: 22 March 2006Item ID: 7658

A Guthix balance (unf) is an unfinished Guthix balance. To make Guthix balance, players must have started In Aid of the Myreque and have at least level 22 Herblore.

They are made by adding garlic to a restore potion (which is made adding harralander and red spider's eggs to a vial of water). This gives 25 Herblore experience. Silver dust should be added to the unfinished potion to make a Guthix balance, also giving 25 experience.

Garlic can be added to restore potion of any dosage; i.e., 1-4 doses. The dosage of the unfinished potion, and finished guthix balance, will be dependent on the original dosage of the restore potion. The number of doses for these unfinished potions is not shown in their names, although it will be for the finished potion. The experience for adding the ingredients is the same, independent of the dosage.

For maximum efficiency, it is recommended that restore potions are decanted into 4-dose potions before Guthix balance potions are created. Alternatively, if being made from scratch for the experience, making the potions at the default 3 doses would earn more experience at the cost of more materials.

15 April 2016
(update)

The item could now be turned into a bank placeholder.

1 May 2014
(update)

The item was renamed from "Unfinished potion" to "Guthix balance (unf)".

22 May –
13 June 2006

The item was renamed from "Unfinished potion."[sic] to "Unfinished potion".
